name: Labocalypse
description:
GET OUT OF THE LAB

You are in the middle of a very dangerous laboratory. You will need to get out of this mess with as many units as you can. Some of the deeper rooms will be quite challenging to manage. The deepest room might seem impossible and you might lose track of where some units are, but there is a way to get out of it.

MADE LIVE ON TWITCH

This game was entirely made from scratch live on Twitch by me, Mike Da Bird. You can go give a follow or even a sub to support me! Here's my Twitch channel! twitch.tv/mikedabird

All episodes are archived on my YouTube channel in this playlist here!

Oh, and here's my Twitter too!
